Container.Name: H5AI
Container.Overview: H5AI is a modern web server index. This docker image makes it trivially easy to spin up a webserver and start sharing your files through the web.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : this path is used to store the configuration H5AI.[br] [b]/var/www[/b] : this path is that will be shared via a web index by H5AI.[br]
Container.Description: H5AI is a modern web server index. This docker image makes it trivially easy to spin up a webserver and start sharing your files through the web.
